greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle T(n,k)=sum{i=0..n, (-1)^(n-i)*C(n,i)*sum{j=0..i-k, C(k,2j)*C(i-k,2j)}}.
comment: Row sums are A021913(n+2). Product with Pascal's triangle A007318 is A119326. A signed version of A058716.
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Sum[(-1)^(n - i)*Binomial[n, i]*Sum[Binomial[k, 2 j]*Binomial[i - k, 2 j], {j, 0, i - k}], {i, 0, n}]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 10}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 25 2013 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, May 14 2006
